sentences.en: He bought a kilo of the haunch pork at very cheap price the vegetable market.
sentences.cn: 他在农贸市场以很便宜的价格买了一斤后臀尖.

sentences.en: He has the perfect body scale: wide sholder and slender haunch.
sentences.cn: 他拥有最完美的身体比例: 肩宽而腰瘦.

sentences.en: Length of body from breast to haunch bone slightly longer than height of withers to ground.
sentences.cn: 身体的长度(从前胸骨到臀骨的距离)略大于肩高.

sentences.en: Restrain tired, improve memory and pain on haunch.
sentences.cn: 改善疲劳 、 记忆力减退、手脚法凉、腰腿酸痛等肾亏的症状.

sentences.en: The haunch of venison is delicious.

trans.tran_cn: 腰腿，（鹿等供食用的）腰腿肉
trans.tran_en: the part of your body that includes your bottom, your hips, and the tops of your legs
